    public final class GameFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is the JFrame class for the main game window.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameFrame

        public GameFrame(GameLabyrinth gameController,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String fileAdd,
                 int gameWidth,
                 int gameHeight,
                 int blockWidth,
                 int blockHeight)
        The constructor :
        参数:
        gameController - The game controller.
        name - The game name to be displayed at the top of the window.
        fileAdd - The file in which the currently displaying labyrinth is stored.
        gameWidth - The width of the game in blocks.
        gameHeight - The height of the game in blocks.
        blockWidth - The width in pixel of a screen block.
        blockHeight - The height in pixel of a screen block.
